github.copilot.chat.commitMessageGenerat.text:
Generate clear, structured Git commit messages in English based on the conventions below:

Types: [Feat], [Fix], [Docs], [Style], [Refactor], [Perf], [Test], [Build], [Ci], [Chore], [Revert], [Ux], [Infra], [Deps], [Localize]

Format:
[type](scope): short summary
— scope is the package.json's name where code changes occurred
— if the change affects multiple packages, use the group's name
— if the change involves versioning, use the root package.json's name(albatrion)

Example:
[Feat](schema-form): add component for waiting for user confirmation

[Body: Additional context if needed]
[Footer: BREAKING CHANGE, issue number, PR references]

• Use imperative mood ("Add", not "Added")
• Limit summary to 50 characters
• Wrap body/footer lines at approximately 72 characters
